attributes.action: Give Pedophiles at least 15 years in jail.
attributes.additional_details: Well, they made a young girl or boy had sex with them at a young age when they didn’t want to. That’s bad enough.
attributes.background: Well, so basically pedophiles are given very low amounts of time. But why? Extend it! They did something very wrong and should be punished severely

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630578
